author: hollowstrawberry
install_msg:
ðŸ–¼ __**GPT Image**__
:warning: **Important:** OpenAI's models cost money every time they are used. Please check <https://openai.com/api/pricing/> and use this cog with care.
**Also, as of the time of writing, you need to verify the identity of your OpenAI account in order to use the gpt-image-1 models, but not for dall-e.**
```Cog installed. Instructions:
1. Load it with [p]load gptimage
2. Add your OpenAI API key with [p]set api openai api_key,INSERT_API_KEY
3. Enable slash commands with [p]slash enablecog gptimage
4. Sync slash commands with [p]slash sync
5. You may need to restart Discord to see the new commands.
5. Use /imagine to start generating images.```
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store user data.
